name: Mayhem’s Adventure
description: This is a small game that was cranked out in less than one week! Showing what enough effort can do! the is a 2d platformer game with some puzzle elements. And Secrets... You have to complete 10 levels, and when you do you get to explore everything with a new special power... This is also a Small Preview before the release of the real Mayhem's World. This is a indie game (made by one person), I have no prior coding experience beside the slow development of Mayhem's World!
